name: backbone-sql
description: PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite3 storage for BackboneORM
author: Gwilym Humphreys (https://github.com/gwilymhumphreys)

scripts.test: npm run build; NODE_ENV=test mocha test/suite.coffee --compilers coffee:coffee-script --reporter spec --timeout 2000
scripts.build_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm build; npm run-script backbone-rest build
scripts.watch_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm watch; npm run-script backbone-rest watch
